title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Agile-Based Online Science Education Curriculum Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Applying agile development principles, one can develop one prototype of a science education module within two weeks
One can improve usability elements of courseware (≥3 iterations) through peer feedback and formative evaluation

Learners can manage a development schedule (including three major milestones) in a distributed team environment over four weeks using Figma and Notion, achieve over 80% weekly task completion rates, and perform a collaborative process that includes recording at least two instances of real-time feedback among team members.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
